blog.name: acepalindrome
blog.title: you're going to be something extraordinary
blog.description: Hello, this is Palindrome! I'm currently doing my best to pretend that I'm a functional and well adjusted adult, with varying levels of success! Around this neck of the woods you'll find history stuff, nature stuff, whatever fandoms I'm into at the moment, fanfics I write when I can muster up the energy, the occasional mental breakdown and a variety of fun facts I come across or things I find interesting. Feel free to follow or drop me a line, I promise I'm quite tame.

summary: The fandom is definitely going to grow a lot once the cartoon comes out, and I worry a bit that it might lead to more drama and...
body: The fandom is definitely going to grow a lot once the cartoon comes out, and I worry a bit that it might lead to more drama and general nastiness in the fandom. From day one I’ve been so blown away by how nice Critters are! There are bad eggs, sure, we all know not to read YouTube comments, but for the most part the people I encounter in the fandom are very friendly and helpful and kind! I feel like part of that is because it’s a show being run by a bunch of genuinely very nice people and it’s just contagious. I’ve noticed that Ive started being more open and friendly since I started watching Critical Role just because so many people I encountered in the community were so nice that I wanted to try to follow suit! So I’m hoping this isn’t something we lose as more people start watching too. I’m hoping we can hold on to this by just being kind to the newcomers and hoping the good attitude rubs off on them too!

tags: im not putting this into any more official tags. but at least it can be there for keeping track
i can already tell a side challenge to this. well. challenge. is making myself post things even when im not happy with them.
but thats just. part of the process for these kind of things isnt it?
going out of my comfort zone
anyway ONE OF THESE DAYS i will draw percy properly in a full 1830s ensemble bc those are my weakness
this is a pale imitation of a joke of that but hey i spiced it up from the fucking. h&m outfit from the original
and i at least think thats.. something.
summary:
Improvement Hell, day two+three: 

Draw a figure using a reference + 

Draw a figure that’s in action, using a reference

 also...
caption:
Improvement Hell, day two+three:  Draw a figure using a reference +  Draw a figure that’s in action, using a reference

also i made it into crit roles to make it more fun for myself, even though theyre not… Quite Right, and percy’s trousers are just. horrifically modern in their fit. but that wasnt the thing i was practicing here and you know what? i did the thing. 

references: [1] [2]

summary: oh. oh. au where yeza is a college professor teaching chemistry and veth sometimes sits in on his class but she's not actually...
question: oh. oh. au where yeza is a college professor teaching chemistry and veth sometimes sits in on his class but she's not actually enrolled because she can't afford it. and when yeza finds out, he invites her to have lunch with him and starts giving her private lessons
answer:
ohohohoh yes. this got long.

  • the reason veth starts going to the lectures to make sure caleb is actually eating the lunches she makes him (or something, it’s caleb’s fault, is what im saying)
  • but then she gets really into the lectures, and also the lecturer and so she keeps accompanying him
  • caleb thinks it’s hilarious she spends half the time staring at yeza’s hair rather than listening and she still knows more than him
  • somehow caleb ends up tutoring beau, after the first session he decides this is a perfect opportunity to get veth to have another person to mother and recommends his friend who is way better at both chemistry and teaching


  • although the next day he meets beau at the library and they end up talking and then exchanging numbers and he has a friend???? now????
  • but anyway, veth isn’t technically in this class but still tutors beau because how could she say no?
  • when yeza compliments some part of beau’s recent project, or something like that, she offhandedly remarks about how much her tutor helped her out
  • and yeza’s interested, because he didn’t realize anyone in his class was interested in tutoring, so he asks for their name,
  • and has to go look up his attendance list, because he doesn’t recall a “veth brenatto” being in his class?
  • yeah, no, this person isn’t in his class, so next day, he scans the room, and sure enough, there’s a lady sitting next to caleb who he’s somehow never noticed before
  • and at first, he wants to say something, but she’s never disruptive, and caleb clearly knows her, and okay maybe she’s a little pretty, okay, but that’s not why he swears
  • so he decides to pretend she’s in his class, because if no one else says anything he’s not going to either, and he starts calling on her in class just to test her knowledge
  • and she’s fucking smart
  • like, damn, if she chose to she could probably be a better teacher than him (this only makes her more pretty to him)
  • so one day, after she’s been shadowing his class for several months, and has started tutoring another student, molly (he won’t stop asking her how to make drugs. if he’d asked politely, maybe she would’ve told him, but now she keeps silent out of spite, and his frustration makes her laugh), he asks her to stay behind after class
  • and he can see she’s nervous, thinking that he’s gonna kick her out, so he just kinda blurts out
  • “do you want to be my teaching assistant?”
  • it’s not his finest moment
  • veth can admit of all the things she was expecting to happen, being asked to teach, of all things, was not it
  • she gapes for while, and then stammers out, “uhm. uh. what-?”
  • and the professor, she doesn’t actually know his last name, he just has his students call him ‘yeza’ starts blushing, and tells her how he realized what she was doing awhile ago but she was really good for the class, and, actually, why aren’t you in my class, officially, I mean?
  • and then she starts blushing, and admits she isn’t actually enrolled her, that she can’t afford it, being from a farming family and all (brief pause, where they simultaneously realize they’re both from felderwin and marvel that they never crossed paths)
  • anyway, she and yeza walk n talk over to the bakery where he has lunch every day, and he meets veth’s friend jester, who works here and who’s dad owns this bakery chain (also he may or may not be the head of a gang?? no one’s brave enough to ask)
  • anyway, they snack on pastries, and yeza insists he’s serious about the teaching assistant position
  • “the salary’s not bad, and if you ever wanted to teach full time, it’d be a good start, plus, if i can be honest veth, you’re smart as hell and a great teacher, from what i’ve heard from beau and molly”
  • “really? molly praised my tutoring?”
  • “yes, he said something about you being the reason he started to actually care about my class. and also something about eventually hearing the secret to making meth-?”
  • *sigh*
  • veth accepts, and after the intial anxiety passes, can’t wait to surprise caleb
  • when yeza introduces her to the class, she trips over her own feet because she’s so nervous, but the class actually seems to like her
  • (beau was super happy for her friend, and threatened anyone who made fun of her with physical violence, plus after a few days, everyone realized she was a great teacher and would tell them about her days making acid if you bribed her with the right item)
  • and,eight months after veth first accompanied caleb to his chemistry class, yeza finally asks her out on a date
  • (it’s at the lavorre bakery, and jester keeps finding excuses to come by their table to ask them how everything’s going and squeal about how cute they are)
  • (a year and a half after she first walked into the chemistry classroom, yeza pulls out a ring and asks her to marry him in the very same spot he’d asked her to be his teaching assistant. they both cry. it’s a spring wedding)

  • “yes, he said something about you being the reason he started to actually care about my class. and also something about eventually hearing the secret to making meth-?”
  • *sigh*
  • veth accepts, and after the intial anxiety passes, can’t wait to surprise caleb
  • when yeza introduces her to the class, she trips over her own feet because she’s so nervous, but the class actually seems to like her
  • (beau was super happy for her friend, and threatened anyone who made fun of her with physical violence, plus after a few days, everyone realized she was a great teacher and would tell them about her days making acid if you bribed her with the right item)
  • and,eight months after veth first accompanied caleb to his chemistry class, yeza finally asks her out on a date
  • (it’s at the lavorre bakery, and jester keeps finding excuses to come by their table to ask them how everything’s going and squeal about how cute they are)
  • (a year and a half after she first walked into the chemistry classroom, yeza pulls out a ring and asks her to marry him in the very same spot he’d asked her to be his teaching assistant. they both cry. it’s a spring wedding)
trail.content_abstract:
ohohohoh yes. this got long.

  • the reason veth starts going to the lectures to make sure caleb is actually eating the lunches she makes him (or something, it’s caleb’s fault, is what im saying)
  • but then she gets really into the lectures, and also the lecturer and so she keeps accompanying him
  • caleb thinks it’s hilarious she spends half the time staring at yeza’s hair rather than listening and she still knows more than him
  • somehow caleb ends up tutoring beau, after the first session he decides this is a perfect opportunity to get veth to have another person to mother and recommends his friend who is way better at both chemistry and teaching

tags: and thats it for.. these things i had lying around that i never finished and probably never will
im sure therell be plenty more things i dont finish in the future
summary: and last but not least of unfinished art im not going to finish: Mermaid Molly/Fjord AU in which all of fjord’s backstory...
caption:
and last but not least of unfinished art im not going to finish: Mermaid Molly/Fjord AU in which all of fjord’s backstory happened but instead of washing up alone on the shore with the sword, molly was there to drag him out of the water. in this universe either molly was just, always a merperson? or perhaps after his first death he was reincarnated or changed somehow to end up being a.. mertiefling. i suppose. because we cant get rid of those horns that would be an affront to, just, everything. (also yes this drawing is absolutely based off of that scene in the little mermaid)

and then also i saw these socks on sockdreams.com and my IMMEDIATE THOUGHT was “Oh My God Molly Would Wear Those” and i proceeded to draw this.

summary:
Good morning, Yasha.  
Whilst I could day I was intrigued by the prospect of Yasha with her hair (kind of) down and chilling at...
caption:
Good morning, Yasha.


Whilst I could day I was intrigued by the prospect of Yasha with her hair (kind of) down and chilling at camp or something, really I just wanted to draw her arms in a vaguely pin-up girl pose.

I am ever so slowly getting back into art. So, naturally, the first thing I draw is my strong barbarian wife.

reblog.comment:
Good morning, Yasha.


Whilst I could day I was intrigued by the prospect of Yasha with her hair (kind of) down and chilling at camp or something, really I just wanted to draw her arms in a vaguely pin-up girl pose.

I am ever so slowly getting back into art. So, naturally, the first thing I draw is my strong barbarian wife.

I am ever so slowly getting back into art. So, naturally, the first thing I draw is my strong barbarian wife.

Some gifs to showcase the model and the facial rig.

Hopefully that doesn’t happen on the next one.

blog.description:
This is a blog with no actual theme, despite hints towards the Raven Cycle series. The things I reblog are according to my interests, of course! (Mostly fandom art for things like Critical Role, something that has entirely consumed my life.) Both my background image and my icon are photos I took in Ireland!
I'm a cisgender female.
Pronouns: She/Her
Orientation: Asexual/?-romantic
